name: visualspecialist
description: file structure for reference later  ├── examples/           // Example svg file(s) created with the app ├── lib/                // Folder for classes or functions     ├── shapes.js       // Exports `Triangle, Circle, and Square classes     ├── shapes.test.js  // Jest tests for shapes     └── more...         // Additional files and tests ├── .gitignore          // Indicates which folders and files Git should ignore ├── index.js            // Runs the application using imports from lib/ ├── package.json └── README.md           // App description, link to video, setup and usage
